thread.title: Marie fishlock
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Marie fishlock

author: Marie fishlock
title: Marie fishlock
text: My first order - great prices and had to unfortunately return but this was a seamless process and refunded within 2 days. Will definitely be using again and will recommend to friends and family. Very impressed.
